Nashville-Davidson.East Nashville Magnet School: East Nashville Magnet School (formerly East Literature Magnet School) is a public combined middle school and high school located in Nashville, Tennessee. Students enter through a lottery process similar to the other magnet schools in Nashville, but it is the only public school in Nashville to serve grades 5 through 12. As of August 2016, both the two buildings only serve 9-12, and the former junior high school building has been renamed to "Building B".
